The study enroll approximately 16 participant . Participants randomly equally assign ( chance , like flip coin ) 1 2 treatment sequence follow : - TAK-831 400 mg Fasted + TAK-831 400 mg Fed - TAK-831 400 mg Fed + TAK-831 400 mg Fasted All participant ask take single oral dose TAK-831 tablet time Day 1 Intervention Period . This single center trial conduct United States . The overall time participate study 23 day . Participants visit clinic Day -1 remain confined Day 3 Intervention Period 1 2 . A washout period minimum 7 day maintain dos Intervention Period . Participants make 3 visit clinic Days 4 , 6 8 Intervention Period contact telephone 14 day last dose study drug ( Day 23 ) follow-up assessment .
